name: Asteroid Attack (Veselie Studios)
description:
Asteroids are headed for Earth! But, fortunately, the scientists found a way to stop them with the help of the moon. Now they send you to control it and destroy the oncoming threat.

Can you handle it? Prove to yourself and humanity that you will live tomorrow!

If you're ready, get behind the phone, grab the controls and save us! But don't worry! You'll get stronger! With the money raised, you will be able to upgrade your moon and earth and go further!

Just touch left or right on the screen. It's easy, huh?
You also have time that doubles your money if the game is over. With this money, you will be able to buy new skins and a variety of updates to help you! Outsmart your friends and prove who is the best!
